Literature.Title: Structure-Activity Study, Characterization, and Mechanism of Action of an Antimicrobial Peptoid D2 and Its d- and l-Peptide Analogues.
Literature.Author: Greco I, Hansen JE, Jana B, Molchanova N, Oddo A, Thulstrup PW, Damborg P, Guardabassi L, Hansen PR

Literature.Title: Structure-Activity Study of an All-d Antimicrobial Octapeptide D2D.
Literature.Author: Lone A, Thomsen TT, Nielsen JE, Thulstrup PW, Klitgaard RN, Lobner-Olesen A, Lund R, Jenssen H, Hansen PR

Sequence Information.Hemolytic Activity: Human erythrocytes:35% Hemolysis=150 µM,Human erythrocytes:23% Hemolysis=150 µM
Sequence Information.Target Organism: Staphylococcus pseudintermedius(MIC=1-4µg/ml),Staphylococcus pseudintermedius(MIC=1-2µg/ml),Staphylococcus pseudintermedius C22963(MIC=4µg/ml),Staphylococcus aureus ATCC 29213(MIC=4µg/ml),Staphylococcus aureus(MIC=2-4µg/ml),Pseudomonas aeruginosa ATCC 27853(MIC=4µg/ml),Pseudomonas aeruginosa 26314(MIC=8µg/ml),Acinetobacter baumannii(MIC=16µg/ml),Corynebacterium auriscanis(MIC=2µg/ml),Escherichia coli(MIC=4µg/ml),Enterococcus faecalis(MIC=8µg/ml),Enterococcus faecium(MIC=4µg/ml),Klebsiella pneumoniae(MIC=8µg/ml),Proteus mirabilis(MIC=>64µg/ml),Escherichia coli ATCC 25922(MIC=8µg/ml),Acinetobacter baumannii ATCC 19606(MIC=4µg/ml)
